title: Gangpol und Mit Discography
description:
This is the audio part of Gangpol und Mit work. (Gangpol does the music and Mit the visual)

Quality is not always tiptop but that's the best i could find.

"Gangpol und Mit works on a peculiar world of digital pop inhabited by colourful and geometrical characters - a bestiary that evolves in lysergic musicals and takes part in apocalyptic cartoons. In this project, music jumps from synth assaults and woody flute leads to mondo beats and cinematic harpsichord keys, with futuristic social songs wrapped in fake MIDI string quartet attempts."

i didn't include the album "1000 softcore tourist people club". it's cheap so if you like what they do, consider buying it.
